WorkItem.Description:
Hello,

When using SUBTOTAL in formula, other nested SUBTOTAL must be ignored to avoid double counting (http://office.microsoft.com/en-us/excel-help/subtotal-HP005209288.aspx).

The actual version of PHPExcel (1.7.9) doesn't implement this specification. I have take some times to add this.

You will find attached on this issue a zip containing the patch and an excel file to reproduce this issue. The expected value for the cell A1 is 3, PHPExcel (1.7.9) gives 9 (=> A2 must not be used to compute A1 value).
Feel free to review and correct the patch if needed.

Thanks,

Regards,

Damien Cl√©ment d'Huart
Key Consulting
WorkItem.Summary: formula using subtotal and nested subtotal : missing feature

Comments.Message:
Hi Damien,

I applied your proposed patch and found a bug. for a cell with value =SUBTOTAL(9,E38,E39:E39) I get:

Fatal error: Call to a member function getParent() on a non-object in XXX\MathTrig.php on line 1071

I tried to trace the error, but failed in understanding enough to find a work around. It seems for the specified formula, MathTrig.SUBTOTAL() receives an array for $pCell, instead of the required object. Any proposed amendments that will fix this bug?
